preference.name: SUBSCMPL_valid_statuses_with_exemptions
preference.preference_description: Indicates the valid statuses of the compliance result which can have exemptions. Valid values are the internal values for the LOV "Scp0SubstanceComplianceStatus". Its out-of-the-box values are: * 0: PASS. * 1: FAIL. * 3: Unapproved FAIL. * 4: Approved PASS. * 6: Invalid. * 7: No Data. * 8: Supplier Pass. * 9: Supplier Fail. * 10: Supplier Unknown. * 11: Error Zero Mass Provided. * 13: Declarable. The default values are 2 (Unapproved PASS), 3 (Unapproved FAIL), 4 (Approved Pass) and 13 (Declarable).
